comments.body: terms can be a list, not sure if this is being handled correctly

This may be true; I have no time to test that right now. However, it is not a regression as the existing implementation does not do anything special either. So it's not related to this PR, IMHO. 

I do not currently have time to work on this, but the improvements currently implemented are self-contained. 

Can we address the list-scenario in a separate issue?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +97,101 @@                key, value = param.split('=')
            except ValueError as e:
                raise AnsibleError("hashi_vault plugin needs key=value pairs, but received %s" % terms)
            vault_dict[key] = value
